SELECT count(1) FROM sales_outbound t LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.user_login = t.saler LEFT JOIN material_info m ON m.CODE = t.material_code LEFT JOIN customer_sale s ON s.CODE = t.customer_code where 1 = 1
and t.material_code like concat('%', #{materialCode}, '%')
and m.name like concat('%', #{materialName}, '%')
and s.name like concat('%', #{customerName}, '%')
and t.bill_no like concat('%', #{billNo}, '%')
and t.saler = #{saler}
and u2.user_name like concat('%', #{salerName}, '%')
and t.out_code = #{outCode}

SELECT t.id, t.material_code, m.NAME AS materialName, m.model, d2.dict_value modelName, m.unit, d3.dict_value unitName, t.unit_price, t.out_count, t.toll_amount, t.customer_code, s.name as customerName, t.out_code, t.saler, u2.user_name AS salerName, t.sale_time, t.approve_state, d4.dict_value approveStateName, t.approve_opinion, t.approve_time, t.confirm_state, d6.dict_value as confirmStateName, t.confirm_user, u4.user_name AS confirmUserName, t.confirm_opinion, t.confirm_time, t.bill_no, t.bill_state, d6.dict_value as billStateName, t.chargeoff_user, u3.user_name AS chargeoffUserName, t.chargeoff_time, t.chargeoff_opinion, t.transport_type, d5.dict_value transportTypeName, t.freight, t.receive_payment, t.receive_payment_time FROM sales_outbound t LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.user_login = t.saler LEFT JOIN sys_user u3 ON u3.user_login = t.chargeoff_user LEFT JOIN sys_user u4 ON u4.user_login = t.confirm_user LEFT JOIN material_info m ON m.CODE = t.material_code LEFT JOIN customer_sale s ON s.CODE = t.customer_code LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d2 ON d2.dict_code = m.model and d2.dict_type = 'material_model' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d3 ON d3.dict_code = m.unit and d3.dict_type = 'material_unit' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d4 ON d4.dict_code = t.approve_state and d4.dict_type = 'approve_state' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d5 ON d5.dict_code = t.transport_type and d5.dict_type = 'transport_type' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d6 ON d6.dict_code = t.bill_state and d6.dict_type = 'bill_state' where t.id =#{id}
